markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channeled Succor](/Feats.aspx?ID=287) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 124 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You can remove conditions with divine grace. You can sacrifice one [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell you’ve prepared in your extra slots from healing font to cast one of the following spells instead: [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [_remove disease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), [_remove paralysis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=253), or [_restoration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=258). The spell is heightened to the same level as the _heal_ spell you sacrificed.
name: Channeled Succor

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Channeled Succor Source Core Rulebook pg. 124 4.0 Prerequisites healing font --- You can remove conditions with divine grace. You can sacrifice one heal spell you’ve prepared in your extra slots from healing font to cast one of the following spells instead: remove curse , remove disease , remove paralysis , or restoration . The spell is heightened to the same level as the heal spell you sacrificed.
